title: Easy panettone
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon dried active baking yeast', '250ml lukewarm water', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 eggs', '110g low-fat plain yoghurt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoon grated lemon zest', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '300g plain flour', '200g wholemeal flour', '80g currants', '80g sultanas', '1 tablespoon icing sugar', 'melted butter (to brush, optional)']
